mapper.insert: INSERT INTO asyn_order (order_no, system_order_no, uid, unit_price, quantity, auto_renew, protocol, asn_type, quality, stock_id, created_at, status) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{systemOrderNo}, #{uid}, #{unitPrice}, #{quantity}, #{autoRenew}, #{protocol}, #{asnType}, #{quality}, #{stockId}, NOW(), #{status})
